amendment.description: To protect congressional oversight of the executive branch by ensuring individuals may speak with Congress.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4023 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4023 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Sasse to Amendment SA 3896.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4023 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
